snippet.title: Angel's Present (PS2) - Chapter 01: Looking for a Mother... [Eng Subs]
snippet.description:
The sound drops out a few times, sorry.  Please let me know if you see any issues with the subs so I can take care of them.  

This video has only the story parts, although I've left boss battles in.  A couple of random encounters ended up sneaking their way in too so if you want to know what the gameplay is like it's pretty much just that.

The translation is not mine, you can find it here: http://www.gamefaqs.com/ps2/580294-tenshi-no-present-marle-oukoku-monogatari/faqs/45630
I did alter a few things for space reasons, but the meaning has not changed.  I also opted to use the name spellings from the booklet included with the game (Eri/Elie, etc.).

Stay tuned for the rest of the chapters.
